title: BundleAGE: Predicting White Matter Age using Along-Tract Microstructural Profiles from Diffusion MRI
details: Y Feng, JE Villalon-Reina, TM Nir, BQ Chandio… - bioRxiv, 2024
abstract: Brain Age Gap Estimation (BrainAGE) is an estimate of the gap between a person's chronological age (CA) and a measure of their brain's' biological age'(BA). This metric is often used as a marker of accelerated aging, albeit with some caveats. Age …
